name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Software Testing Analyst with 9+ years of experience in Quality Assurance, Automated Testing, and implementing robust testing strategies. Proficient in **C#**, **Selenium**, and **Cypress** for test automation, ensuring high-quality application delivery through rigorous testing methodologies. Experienced in data collection and managing EMR to EDC conversions, demonstrating strong analytical skills and attention to detail. Strong communication abilities, both verbal and written, complemented by a solid foundation in technical documentation. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams and leveraging AI and Federated Learning techniques to enhance risk assessment and streamline testing processes.

experience.responsibilities:
Conducted **Quality Assurance** and **Automated Testing** procedures utilizing **Selenium** and **Cypress** to ensure software reliability and performance, achieving a 30% reduction in post-release defects.
Performed thorough **Data Collection** and analysis to streamline **EMR to EDC Conversions**, improving data accuracy by **15%**.
Developed technical documentation to facilitate seamless **Verbal Communication** and **Written Communication** between technical and non-technical team members, enhancing project collaboration by **20%**.
Participated in **Risk Assessment** activities to identify potential project risks early, improving project delivery timelines by **10%**.
Implemented **AI** strategies and contributed to **Federated Learning** projects to enhance machine learning outcomes and data security.
Assisted in establishing guidelines for testing protocols, improving overall testing efficiency by **25%**.
Collaborated closely with the development team on technical issues to ensure seamless integration of features and functionality, contributing to a user-centered design approach.

Conducted quality assurance testing with **C#** to ensure software quality and functionality, achieving a 98% pass rate on the first deployment.
Developed and executed automated testing scripts using **Selenium** and **Cypress**, leading to a **30% reduction** in manual testing time.
Collaborated with developers to implement automated tests for **EMR to EDC conversions**, enhancing the accuracy of data collection processes by **15%**.
Performed risk assessment for new features, improving the project's overall stability and user satisfaction by addressing potential issues before release.
Created and maintained comprehensive technical documentation, ensuring clarity and effectiveness in communication with stakeholders and team members.
Leveraged **Data Collection** strategies to gather insights, contributing to informed decision-making that increased system performance by **20%**.
Facilitated verbal and written communication with cross-functional teams to define testing requirements, resulting in **timely project delivery** within deadlines.
Managed project timelines effectively, ensuring that all testing phases align with the overall development schedule.
Provided mentorship and training sessions to junior team members on best testing practices, fostering a collaborative and skilled team environment.
Utilized federated learning principles to test AI features, ensuring compliance with data security and privacy standards.

Established automated testing frameworks using **Selenium** and **Cypress** to enhance software quality and coverage, resulting in a **30%** increase in defect detection rate.
Conducted thorough quality assurance assessments on applications developed in **C#**, ensuring compliance with project specifications and user requirements.
Developed comprehensive technical documentation to support the integration of **Data Collection** methodologies, improving team understanding by **25%**.
Collaborated in the execution of **Risk Assessment** protocols, identifying potential failures and implementing actionable solutions.
Facilitated **EMR to EDC Conversions** through rigorous testing methodologies to ensure data integrity and accuracy.
Implemented **Automated Testing** strategies that significantly reduced testing time by **40%**, increasing overall productivity.
Engaged in **Verbal Communication** and **Written Communication** to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
Played a pivotal role in data analysis for emerging AI technologies and participated in projects utilizing **Federated Learning** techniques.
Conducted extensive testing to validate system functionality, performance, and security, consistently meeting project milestones across **9** major releases.
